-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Binary instances for vector types (deprecated)
--   
--   DEPRECATED. Use vector-binary-instances &gt;= 0.2 instead.
--   
--   The library provides binary instances for boxed and unboxed vector
--   types. The code is based on the vector-binary-instances package but
--   restricts instances to monomorphic vector types.
@package vector-binary
@version 0.1.1

module Data.Vector.Binary
instance Binary e => Binary (Vector e)
instance (Unbox e, Binary e) => Binary (Vector e)
